content.text: 6 pounds tart apples, cored and sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "6 pounds tart apples, cored and sliced" )

content.text: 0) Place the apples in a Dutch oven.
2) Bring to a boil and cook on medium heat 30 minutes, or until soft.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "cook"@23:27 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "medium heat"@31:42 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "30 minutes"@43:53 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until soft"@58:68 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "boil"@14:18 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Press the softened mixture through a food mill.
4) Continue cooking at a medium boil for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5) Mix in the sugar, cinnamon and cloves.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the sugar"@10:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cinnamon"@21:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cloves"@34:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Continue cooking over low heat until the sugar dissolves, stirring frequently.
7) Cook until the desired thickness has been attained.
8) Refrigerate the finished apple butter in sterile containers.
